revised_title: Samuel Walter Johnson Smith: A Life of Intellectual Distinction and Service
tldr: Samuel Walter Johnson Smith was a distinguished physicist and educator, known for his work in electrocapillarity and contributions to physics education. Born in Scotland, he inherited his father's love for science and engineering, and went on to study at the Royal College of Science and Trinity College, Cambridge. Smith made significant advancements in the field of electrocapillarity and was a dedicated educator, influencing many students throughout his career.
